name: DieOptic
description:
Long ago, an innocent eye was given a curse! It's actions would be chosen by a dice. Every time the eye has to perform a major action, it has to roll the dice. This eye wanted revenge! It's set out to destroy the world, and YOU have to stop it!

GAMEPLAY:

The boss has 6 phases, a random phase is chosen on the roll of a dice and you need to change your strategy accordingly. 

CONTROLS:

WASD to move around

W x 2 to fly / use the rocket

click or long press the mouse button to shoot!

DISCLAIMER:

This game is hard. Keep trying and don't give up!

The boss'  phase changes randomly, every 5 to 10 seconds. 

EVERYTHING IN THE GAME WAS MADE  BY ME (except the font) IN UNDER 48 HOURS FOR THE GMTK JAM 2022.
